name: Cube Tanks - Blitz War 3D
description:
Do you remember old-school tanks shooters with incredible 8 bit graphics? Maybe you have seen this world only in 2D on your old monitor, but now it's time for a new great adventure. You are locked in the pixel world of this shooting game, and you have no choice but try to survive! Cube Tanks - Blitz War 3D invites you to arena of infinite deadly battles, powerful iron horses and… pixels!
HOW TO PLAY: Drive your tank and shoot enemy tanks. Control your health indicator.

Cube Tanks - Blitz War 3D game features:
• Stunning pixel graphics;
• Tanks war and battles in 3D;
• Addictive military game;
• Smooth animation and great sounds;
• Easy-to-use sensor control;
• Nostalgic plot.

Finally, war age came. Fight for your life in Cube Tanks - Blitz War 3D!
